Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Netherworld Lane, south of the Bushman Farms.
Room.LongDescription: The large farmland to the north provides much of the fruits and vege- tables to the people of Oceancrest. Being located next to the Necropolis, there's not much else one can do. Reginald Bushman makes a good living harvesting the fruits and vegetables in his orchards, and can often use some unskilled labor to rid the garden of unwanted pests.
